definition: to abolish/to abandon/to abrogate/to discard/to depose/to oust/crippled/abandoned/waste

sentences.english: Is it possible to share your view about scrap demand in the short term?
sentences.chinese: 是否可以分享您對廢鋼的需求在短期內看法呢？

sentences.english: Wealthy countries restrain the export of scrap iron and steel.
sentences.chinese: 富裕國家限制出口廢鋼鐵。

sentences.english: A week ago, waste metal scraps were stored here, but now they have been all cleared away.
sentences.chinese: 一星期前，這裏還堆着廢鋼爛鐵，現在都搬走了。
